com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler

Interface MesosEventClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScheduler, DefaultScheduler, MultiServiceEventClient, UninstallScheduler

    public interface MesosEventClient
    Accepts events received from Mesos.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MesosEventClient.ClientStatusResponse
      Response object to be returned by a call to getClientStatus().
      static class  MesosEventClient.OfferResponse
      Response object to be returned by a call to #offers(List).
      static class  MesosEventClient.TaskStatusResponse
      Response object to be returned by a call to #taskStatus(org.apache.mesos.Protos.TaskStatus).
      static class  MesosEventClient.UnexpectedResourcesResponse
      Response object to be returned by a call to #getUnexpectedResources(List).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MesosEventClient.ClientStatusResponse getClientStatus()
      Called periodically to check the client status.
      java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> getHTTPEndpoints()
      Returns any HTTP resources to be served on behalf of this instance.
      MesosEventClient.UnexpectedResourcesResponse getUnexpectedResources(java.util.Collection<Protos.Offer> unusedOffers)
      Returns a list of resources from the provided list of offers which are not recognized by this client.
      MesosEventClient.OfferResponse offers(java.util.Collection<Protos.Offer> offers)
      Called when the framework has received offers from Mesos.
      void registered(boolean reRegistered)
      Called when the framework has registered (or re-registered) with Mesos.
      MesosEventClient.TaskStatusResponse taskStatus(Protos.TaskStatus status)
      Called when the framework has received a task status update from Mesos.
      void unregistered()
      Called after the framework has been unregistered from Mesos following a call to offers(Collection) which returned OfferResponse#readyToUninstall() as a response.

    • Method Detail

      • registered

        void registered(boolean reRegistered)
        Called when the framework has registered (or re-registered) with Mesos.
        Parameters:
        reRegistered - Whether this is an initial registration (false) or a re-registration (true)

      • unregistered

        void unregistered()
        Called after the framework has been unregistered from Mesos following a call to offers(Collection) which returned OfferResponse#readyToUninstall() as a response. When this is called, the service should advertise the completion of the uninstall operation in its deploy plan.

      • getClientStatus

        MesosEventClient.ClientStatusResponse getClientStatus()
        Called periodically to check the client status. These responses are generally used to tell upstream something about the state of the client, and/or telling upstream to do something.

      • offers

        MesosEventClient.OfferResponse offers(java.util.Collection<Protos.Offer> offers)
        Called when the framework has received offers from Mesos. The provided list may be empty.
        Parameters:
        offers - A list of offers which may be used in offer evaluation
        Returns:
        The response containing a list of operations to be performed against the offers, as well as a list of offers which were left unused. See MesosEventClient.OfferResponse

      • getUnexpectedResources

        MesosEventClient.UnexpectedResourcesResponse getUnexpectedResources(java.util.Collection<Protos.Offer> unusedOffers)
        Returns a list of resources from the provided list of offers which are not recognized by this client. The returned unexpected resources will immediately be unreserved/destroyed.
        Parameters:
        unusedOffers - The list of offers which were unclaimed in a prior call to offers(Collection)
        Returns:
        A subset of the provided offers paired with their resources to be unreserved/destroyed. May be paired with an error state if remaining unused offers should be declined-short rather than declined-long.

      • taskStatus

        MesosEventClient.TaskStatusResponse taskStatus(Protos.TaskStatus status)
        Called when the framework has received a task status update from Mesos.
        Parameters:
        status - The status message describing the new state of a task
        Returns:
        The response which describes whether the status was successfully processed

      • getHTTPEndpoints

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> getHTTPEndpoints()
        Returns any HTTP resources to be served on behalf of this instance.
        Returns:
        A list of annotated resource objects to be served by Jetty
